fuzz.settings.props.name: Prop Search filters
fuzz.settings.props.hint: Comma separated properties starting from the document.system path
fuzz.settings.deepFile.name: Deep File Search
fuzz.settings.deepFile.hint: Search for files inside folders when using the file Picker (requires at least 4 characters by default).
fuzz.settings.deepFileExclude.name: Deep File Search: Exclude Keywords
fuzz.settings.deepFileExclude.hint: Comma separated keywords to exclude from the deep file search. If any full path contains any of these keywords, it will be excluded from the search.
fuzz.settings.deepFilePlayers.name: Deep File Search: Allow Players
fuzz.settings.deepFilePlayers.hint: Allow players to use the deep file search. WARNING: Enabling this feature will give players access to search ANY file.
fuzz.settings.deepFileCharLimit.name: Deep File Search: Character Limit
fuzz.settings.deepFileCharLimit.hint: The minimum number of characters required to trigger the deep file search.
fuzz.settings.excavateFilters.name: Excavate Filters
fuzz.settings.excavateFilters.hint: Comma separated folder names to be applied as filters to the results of the Excavate Token search (requires deep file search)
fuzz.settings.excavateWildcard.name: Excavate Wildcard
fuzz.settings.excavateWildcard.hint: When Excavating tokens, if this option is enabled find the wildcard path. The Randomize Wildcard Images checkbox must be cheked before excavating
fuzz.settings.useS3.name: Use S3 Bucket
fuzz.settings.useS3.hint: When enabled, the S3 bucket will be used as well as the user and core folders. This will require a valid AWS account and a valid S3 bucket name
fuzz.settings.useS3name.name: S3 Bucket Name
fuzz.settings.useS3name.hint: The name of the S3 bucket to use
fuzz.settings.rebuildchash.name: Rebuild File Cache
fuzz.settings.chatSearch.name: Chat Search
fuzz.settings.chatSearch.hint: Enable search box on top of the chat sidebar
fuzz.warn.cache: Dig Down - Building File cache, please don't refresh, this can take some time... Percentage progress cannot be tracked and will show as 99%.
